body_html: @itsmeolivia FYI, the shape checking code is crashing sometimes on a few Ubuntu machines I tried (not on a Mac though), at graph->refiner.GetContext(&new_src.oper->node). It happens because node_to_context_ inside the refiner is uninitialized I think. I'm not sure what is the root cause of the problem though.
body_text: @itsmeolivia FYI, the shape checking code is crashing sometimes on a few Ubuntu machines I tried (not on a Mac though), at graph->refiner.GetContext(&new_src.oper->node). It happens because node_to_context_ inside the refiner is uninitialized I think. I'm not sure what is the root cause of the problem though.
body: @itsmeolivia FYI, the shape checking code is crashing sometimes on a few Ubuntu machines I tried (not on a Mac though), at `graph->refiner.GetContext(&new_src.oper->node)`. It happens because `node_to_context_` inside the refiner is uninitialized I think. I'm not sure what is the root cause of the problem though.
